work_experience.title: React Developer
work_experience.description: Mobile technology platform hosting events for premium brands.
responsibilities: Eventbase Manager: a CMS-like tool that enables event-specific configuration of our mobile app instances. Contributions thus far have included React refactoring (from AngularJS legacy), replacement of class-based components and Redux architecture with hooks-based implementations, unit tests and Storybook components, and user interaction tracking.
Regularly scheduled mentoring and code reviews with junior developers.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
work_experience.description: FinTech SaaS startup developing an AI-powered conversational banking assistant (chatbot).
responsibilities: Bot Backend: Core business logic for banking assistant, building APIs, third-party API integration, database integration (NodeJS, Express, REST API, Jest, PostgreSQL, Sequelize)
Chat SDK: In-house chat platform frontend (React/Redux, React Native, Styled Components, MQTT, Jest/Enzyme, Storybook, APNS, Firebase)
Business Metrics Reporting: customer journey analytics tracking (NodeJS, Cloudwatch, Kinesis, AWS Lambda, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Google DLP)
